Text:
so today i finally update my apple tv to 4.1 and I dont have any problems.  instantly plays all my movies.

the firmware is AppleTV2,1_4.2_8C150_Restore.ipsw

you can fetch it here

http://www.felixbruns.de/iPod/firmware/

then connect apple tv to computer and when you click on the restore hold the option button down or control or whatever on a pc then select the restore file.

works fine for me.

by the way to use tinyumbrella first boot your atv2 with the power cord and hdmi cable connected only.  once its running then remove hdmi and plug in usb.  it will then show up properly in tinyumbrella.
Great news HolyRoses!  You try airplay?
yea works for me, can send video from itunes to tv.
watch what katy perry does at 40:15.  its funny :)
